injure.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to hurt yourself or someone else, for example in an accident or an attack
injure.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Angus injured his leg playing rugby.
Two people have been critically injured in an accident.
injure.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to cause physical harm to someone or to yourself, for example in an accident
injure.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He sought compensation after being injured by a defective product.
injure.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to make an industry, economy, company, or investor lose money or suffer in some other way
injure.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: The US steel industry was being injured by imports of subsidized steel.
